importer.sql: SELECT maes.ageo_id , maes.ageo_codigo , (SELECT i18n.ageo_nombre FROM iest_areageograficai18n_ageo i18n WHERE i18n.ageo_id = maes.ageo_id AND i18n.ageo_idioma = ? AND ? BETWEEN ageo_fecha_creacion AND COALESCE(ageo_fecha_fin, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM iest_areageografica_ageo maes ORDER BY maes.ageo_es_activo DESC

SELECT maes.amun_id , maes.amun_codigo , (SELECT i18n.amun_nombre FROM iest_areamundiali18n_amun i18n WHERE i18n.amun_id = maes.amun_id AND i18n.amun_idioma = ? AND ? SELECT MAES.REMT_id , MAES.REMT_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.REMT_NOMBRE FROM IREM_MOVIMIENTOTIPOi18n_REMT I18N WHERE I18N.REMT_ID = MAES.REMT_ID AND I18N.REMT_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN REMT_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(REMT_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IREM_MOVIMIENTOTIPO_REMT MAES order by MAES.REMT_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.ORGT_id , I18N.ORGT_descripcion , MAES.ORGT_TIPO_BASE , I18N.ORGT_NOMBRE FROM ICOM_ORGANIZACIONTIPO_ORGT MAES INNER JOIN ICOM_ORGANIZACIONTIPOI18N_ORGT I18N ON I18N.ORGT_ID = MAES.ORGT_ID AND I18N.ORGT_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ORGT_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ORGT_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.ORGT_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.PRET_id , MAES.PRET_TIPO_BASE , (SELECT I18N.PRET_NOMBRE FROM ICOM_PRESTADORTIPOi18n_PRET I18N WHERE I18N.PRET_ID = MAES.PRET_ID AND I18N.PRET_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN PRET_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(PRET_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM ICOM_PRESTADORTIPO_PRET MAES order by MAES.PRET_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.SETT_id , MAES.SETT_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.SETT_NOMBRE FROM IESC_SERVICIOTIPOi18n_SETT I18N WHERE I18N.SETT_ID = MAES.SETT_ID AND I18N.SETT_IDIOMA = ? AND ? SELECT MAES.TSUP_id , MAES.TSUP_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.TSUP_NOMBRE FROM ISUP_TIPOSUPERFICIEi18n_TSUP I18N WHERE I18N.TSUP_ID = MAES.TSUP_ID AND I18N.TSUP_IDIOMA = ? AND ? SELECT MAES.TSEX_id , MAES.TSEX_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.TSEX_NOMBRE FROM IEXP_TIPOSUPERFICIEBi18n_TSEX I18N WHERE I18N.TSEX_ID = MAES.TSEX_ID AND I18N.TSEX_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN TSEX_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(TSEX_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IEXP_TIPOSUPERFICIEB_TSEX MAES order by MAES.TSEX_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.UNIS_id , MAES.UNIS_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.UNIS_NOMBRE FROM ISUP_UNIDADi18n_UNIS I18N WHERE I18N.UNIS_ID = MAES.UNIS_ID AND I18N.UNIS_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN UNIS_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(UNIS_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM ISUP_UNIDAD_UNIS MAES order by MAES.UNIS_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.ZOPE_id , MAES.ZOPE_CODIGO , (SELECT I18N.ZOPE_NOMBRE FROM IPES_ZONAPESCAi18n_ZOPE I18N WHERE I18N.ZOPE_ID = MAES.ZOPE_ID AND I18N.ZOPE_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ZOPE_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(ZOPE_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IPES_ZONAPESCA_ZOPE MAES order by MAES.ZOPE_ES_ACTIVO desc
SELECT MAES.BGTE_id , MAES.BGTE_CODIGO , MAES.BGTE_LIMITE_INFERIOR FROM IEST_BUQUETIPOGTEEE_BGTE MAES order by MAES.BGTE_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.ACUE_id , MAES.ACUE_CODIGO , maes.acue_fecha_comienzo , MAES.ACUE_FECHA_FINAL , TEMP.ACUE_ES_APLICA_MANIFIESTO , TEMP.ACUE_ES_APLICA_escala , (SELECT I18N.ACUE_NOMBRE FROM IESC_ACUERDOI18N_ACUE I18N WHERE I18N.ACUE_ID = MAES.ACUE_ID AND I18N.ACUE_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ACUE_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ACUE_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IESC_ACUERDO_ACUE MAES INNER JOIN IESC_ACUERDOTEMP_ACUE TEMP ON TEMP.ACUE_ID = MAES.ACUE_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.acue_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.acue_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.ACUE_es_activo desc

SELECT maes.conv_id , maes.conv_codigo , temp.conv_fecha_inicio_convenio , temp.conv_fecha_fin_convenio , temp.conv_empresa , temp.conv_codigo_edi , (SELECT i18n.conv_nombre FROM iesc_convenioi18n_conv i18n WHERE i18n.conv_id = maes.conv_id AND i18n.conv_idioma = ? AND ? BETWEEN conv_fecha_creacion AND COALESCE(conv_fecha_fin, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM iesc_convenio_conv maes INNER JOIN iesc_conveniotemp_conv temp ON temp.conv_id = maes.conv_id ORDER BY maes.conv_es_activo DESC, temp.conv_fecha_inicio_convenio DESC
SELECT MAES.vmar_id , MAES.vmar_codigo , MAES.vmar_marca FROM IMAN_MARCAVEHICULO_VMAR MAES order by MAES.VMAR_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.MMPP_id , MAES.MMPP_NUMERO_ONU || '-' || MAES.MMPP_CLASE || '-' || MAES.MMPP_numero_version as maes_codigo , MAES.MMPP_NUMERO_ONU , MAES.MMPP_CLASE , MAES.MMPP_NUMERO_version , (SELECT I18N.MMPP_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_MMPPi18n_MMPP I18N WHERE I18N.MMPP_ID = MAES.MMPP_ID AND I18N.MMPP_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN MMPP_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(MMPP_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_MMPP_MMPP MAES order by MAES.MMPP_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.TEDI_id , MAES.TEDI_codigo , MAES.TEDI_tipo , (SELECT I18N.TEDI_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_MODOTRANSPEDIi18n_TEDI I18N WHERE I18N.TEDI_ID = MAES.TEDI_ID AND I18N.TEDI_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN TEDI_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(TEDI_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_MODOTRANSPEDI_TEDI MAES order by MAES.TEDI_es_activo desc
SELECT MAES.NAVI_id , MAES.NAVI_CODIGO , MAES.NAVI_DESCRIPCION FROM IESC_NAVIERA_NAVI MAES order by MAES.NAVI_es_activo desc
SELECT MAES.RECE_id , MAES.RECE_CODIGO , MAES.RECE_DESCRIPCION FROM IMAN_RECEPTOR_RECE MAES order by MAES.RECE_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.ACTT_id , MAES.ACTT_CODIGO , MAES.ACTT_codigo_est , (SELECT I18N.ACTT_NOMBRE FROM IESC_ACTIVIDADTIPOi18n_ACTT I18N WHERE I18N.ACTT_ID = MAES.ACTT_ID AND I18N.ACTT_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ACTT_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(ACTT_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IESC_ACTIVIDADTIPO_ACTT MAES order by MAES.ACTT_es_activo desc

select ratt_id , (SELECT atet_codigo FROM IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPO_ATET where ATET_id = RATT_ATET_ID_1) || (SELECT atet_codigo FROM IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPO_ATET where ATET_id = RATT_ATET_ID_2) || (SELECT atet_codigo FROM IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPO_ATET where ATET_id = RATT_ATET_ID_3) AS ratt_atet , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ratt_atrt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_ATRAQUETIPO_ATRT') as ratt_atrt , (select atet_nombre from IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPOI18N_ATET where atet_id = RATT_ATET_ID_1 and ATET_IDIOMA = idioma AND FREFERENCIA BETWEEN ATET_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ATET_FECHA_FIN, FREFERENCIA)) || ' / ' || (select atet_nombre from IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPOI18N_ATET where atet_id = RATT_ATET_ID_2 and ATET_IDIOMA = idioma AND FREFERENCIA BETWEEN ATET_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ATET_FECHA_FIN, FREFERENCIA)) || ' / ' || (select atet_nombre from IESC_ATRAQUEEDITIPOI18N_ATET where atet_id = RATT_ATET_ID_3 and ATET_IDIOMA = idioma AND FREFERENCIA BETWEEN ATET_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ATET_FECHA_FIN, FREFERENCIA)) AS texto from ( select ? as idioma, ? as FREFERENCIA, ? as fref, ratt.* from IESC_RELACIONATRAQUETIPO_RATT ratt ) sql

SELECT MAES.TERM_id , SUBSTR(MAES.TERM_CODIGO, 1, 1) , SUBSTR(MAES.TERM_CODIGO, 2) , TEMP.TERM_ES_CONCESION , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.term_ivat_id AND trid_table_name = 'IFAC_IVATIPO_IVAT') as term_ivat , (SELECT I18N.TERM_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_TERMnINALi18n_TERM I18N WHERE I18N.TERM_ID = MAES.TERM_ID AND I18N.TERM_IDIOMA = ? SELECT MAES.UNIC_id , MAES.UNIC_CODIGO , TEMP.UNIC_TIPO_EEE, TEMP.UNIC_ES_EEE, TEMP.UNIC_TEUS , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.unic_emet_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_MERCANCIATIPO_EMET') as unic_emet , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.unic_merc_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_MERCANCIA_MERC') as unic_merc , (SELECT I18N.UNIC_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_UNIDADCARGAI18N_UNIC I18N WHERE I18N.UNIC_ID = MAES.UNIC_ID AND I18N.UNIC_IDIOMA = ? BETWEEN TEMP.MERC_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.MERC_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.MERC_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.UNIC_id , MAES.UNIC_CODIGO , TEMP.UNIC_TIPO_EEE, TEMP.UNIC_ES_EEE, TEMP.UNIC_TEUS , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.unic_emet_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_MERCANCIATIPO_EMET') as unic_emet , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.unic_merc_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_MERCANCIA_MERC') as unic_merc , (SELECT I18N.UNIC_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_UNIDADCARGAI18N_UNIC I18N WHERE I18N.UNIC_ID = MAES.UNIC_ID AND I18N.UNIC_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN UNIC_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(UNIC_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IMAN_UNIDADCARGA_UNIC MAES JOIN IMAN_UNIDADCARGATEMP_UNIC TEMP ON TEMP.UNIC_ID = MAES.UNIC_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.UNIC_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.UNIC_FECHA_FIN, ?) WHERE TEMP.UNIC_MERC_ID IS NOT NULL order by MAES.UNIC_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.radu_id , MAES.radu_codigo , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.radu_unlocode_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') as radu_unlocode , (SELECT I18N.RADU_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_RECINTOADUANEROi18n_RADU I18N WHERE I18N.RADU_ID = MAES.RADU_ID AND I18N.RADU_IDIOMA = ? SELECT MAES.SUBP_id , MAES.SUBP_CODIGO , MAES.SUBP_CODIGO_EDI , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.subp_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') as subp_unlo , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ( SELECT radu_id FROM IMAN_RECINTOADUANERO_RADU WHERE RADU_UNLOCODE_ID = SUBP_UNLO_ID ) AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_RECINTOADUANERO_RADU') as subp_radu , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.subp_ivat_id AND trid_table_name = 'IFAC_IVATIPO_IVAT') as subp_ivat , MAES.SUBP_ES_PARA_ESTADISTICAS , (SELECT I18N.subp_NOMBRE FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTOi18n_SUBP I18N WHERE I18N.SUBP_ID = MAES.SUBP_ID AND I18N.SUBP_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN SUBP_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(SUBP_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP MAES order by MAES.SUBP_es_activo desc

select maes.ZONS_id , (select SUBP_CODIGO from IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP where SUBP_ID = maes.ZONS_SUBP_ID) AS SUBP_CODIGO , maes.ZONS_CODIGO as codigo
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.zons_tipo_superficie_id AND trid_table_name = 'ISUP_TIPOSUPERFICIE_TSUP') as zons_tipo_superficie , to_char(temp.ZONS_CODIGO_EXENCION) , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.zons_grupo_zona_deposito_id AND trid_table_name = 'ISUP_GRUPOZONA_GZSU') as zons_grupo_zona_deposito , temp.ZONS_ES_RO_RO , temp.ZONS_ES_ZONA_MUELLES , temp.ZONS_SUPERFICIE , temp.ZONS_ALTURA , temp.ZONS_PLANTAS
, (SELECT I18N.ZONS_NOMBRE FROM ISUP_ZONAI18N_ZONS I18N WHERE I18N.ZONS_ID = MAES.ZONS_ID AND I18N.ZONS_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ZONS_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ZONS_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE from ISUP_ZONA_ZONS maes join ISUP_ZONATEMP_ZONS temp on temp.ZONS_ID = maes.ZONS_ID AND ? BETWEEN temp.ZONS_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(temp.ZONS_FECHA_FIN, ?)

SELECT MAES.TRAF_id , (SELECT SUBP_CODIGO FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = TRAF_SUBP_ID) AS SUBP_CODIGO , MAES.TRAF_CODIGO AS CODIGO , MAES.TRAF_INCREMENTA_CONTADORES , (SELECT I18N.TRAF_NOMBRE FROM IESC_TRAFICOi18n_TRAF I18N WHERE I18N.TRAF_ID = MAES.TRAF_ID AND I18N.TRAF_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN TRAF_FECHA_CREACION and coalesce(TRAF_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IESC_TRAFICO_TRAF MAES order by MAES.TRAF_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.MUEL_id , SUBSTR(MAES.MUEL_CODIGO, 1, 1) AS SUBP_CODIGO , SUBSTR(MAES.MUEL_CODIGO, 2) , (SELECT I18N.MUEL_NOMBRE FROM IESC_MUELLEi18n_MUEL I18N WHERE I18N.MUEL_ID = MAES.MUEL_ID AND I18N.MUEL_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN MUEL_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(MUEL_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IESC_MUELLE_MUEL MAES JOIN IESC_MUELLEtemp_MUEL TEMP ON TEMP.MUEL_ID = MAES.MUEL_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.MUEL_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.MUEL_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.MUEL_es_activo desc

SELECT maes.INDA_id , (SELECT SUBP_CODIGO FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = INDA_SUBPUERTO_ID) AS SUBP_CODIGO , INDA_CODIGO as codigo , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.inda_puerto_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') as inda_puerto , MAES.INDA_OBSERVACIONES , (SELECT I18N.INDA_NOMBRE FROM IEMD_INSTALACIONDEPAI18N_INDA I18N WHERE I18N.INDA_ID = MAES.INDA_ID AND I18N.INDA_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN INDA_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(INDA_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS I18N_NOMBRE FROM IEMD_INSTALACIONDEPA_INDA MAES order by INDA_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.indp_id , (SELECT SUBP_CODIGO FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = INDP_SUBPUERTO_ID) AS SUBP_CODIGO , MAES.INDP_CODIGO AS MAES_CODIGO , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.indp_tipo_amarre_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOAMARRE_TAMD') as indp_tipo_amarre , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.indp_tipo_embarcacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOEMBARCACION_TEMD') as indp_tipo_embarcacion , MAES.indp_calado_real , MAES.indp_manga_real , MAES.INDP_ESLORA_REAL , MAES.INDP_ALTURA_REAL , MAES.INDP_CALADO_MAXIMO , MAES.indp_manga_maxima , MAES.INDP_ESLORA_MAXIMA , MAES.indp_altura_maxima , MAES.indp_calado_minimo , MAES.indp_manga_minima , MAES.INDP_ESLORA_MINIMA , MAES.INDP_ALTURA_MINIMA , MAES.INDP_ES_EN_TIERRA , MAES.INDP_observaciones , (SELECT I18N.INDP_NOMBRE FROM IEMD_INSTALACIONDEPi18n_INDP I18N WHERE I18N.INDP_ID = MAES.INDP_ID AND I18N.INDP_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN INDP_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(INDP_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IEMD_INSTALACIONDEP_INDP MAES order by MAES.INDP_es_activo desc

SELECT maes.AMAD_id , ( select subp_codigo from IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP where subp_id = ( select INDP_SUBPUERTO_ID from IEMD_INSTALACIONDEP_INDP WHERE indp_id = maes.AMAD_INSTALACIONDEP_ID ) ) AS subp_codigo , ( select indp_codigo from IEMD_INSTALACIONDEP_INDP WHERE indp_id = maes.AMAD_INSTALACIONDEP_ID ) || '-' || maes.AMAD_PANTALAN || '-' || maes.AMAD_PUESTO AS codigo , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.amad_instalaciondep_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_INSTALACIONDEP_INDP') as amad_instalaciondep , maes.AMAD_PANTALAN, maes.AMAD_PUESTO, maes.AMAD_estado, maes.AMAD_descripcion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.amad_tipoamarre_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOAMARRE_TAMD') as amad_tipoamarre , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.amad_tipoembarcacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOEMBARCACION_TEMD') as amad_tipoembarcacion , maes.amad_calado_real, maes.amad_manga_real, maes.amad_eslora_real, maes.amad_altura_real , maes.amad_calado_maximo, maes.amad_manga_maxima, maes.amad_eslora_maxima, maes.amad_altura_maxima , maes.amad_calado_minimo, maes.amad_manga_minima, maes.amad_eslora_minima, maes.amad_altura_minima , maes.amad_observaciones FROM IEMD_AMARRE_AMAD maes

SELECT maes.alin_id , SUBSTR(MAES.ALIN_CODIGO, 1, 1) AS subp_codigo , SUBSTR(MAES.ALIN_CODIGO, 2) , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.alin_muel_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_MUELLE_MUEL') as alin_muel , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.alin_alit_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_ALINEACIONTIPO_ALIT') as alin_alit , TEMP.ALIN_NORAY_INICIAL , temp.ALIN_NORAY_FINAL , temp.ALIN_CALADO , temp.ALIN_longitud , temp.ALIN_ANCHURA , temp.ALIN_ES_EN_CONCESION , temp.ALIN_ES_DE_PARTICULARES , TEMP.ALIN_ES_AGUAS_EN_COCESION , temp.ALIN_ZONA_PUERTO , (SELECT I18N.ALIN_NOMBRE FROM IGEN_ALINEACIONI18N_ALIN I18N WHERE I18N.ALIN_ID = MAES.ALIN_ID AND I18N.ALIN_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN ALIN_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(ALIN_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IGEN_ALINEACION_ALIN MAES JOIN IGEN_ALINEACIONTEMP_ALIN TEMP ON TEMP.ALIN_ID = MAES.ALIN_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.ALIN_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.ALIN_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.ALIN_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.ORGA_id , MAES.ORGA_COD , MAES.orga_nombre , MAES.ORGA_TIPO_DOC_FISCAL , COALESCE(MAES.ORGA_DOC_FISCAL_PREFIJO, '') || COALESCE(MAES.ORGA_DOC_FISCAL, '') || COALESCE(MAES.ORGA_DOC_FISCAL_SUFIJO, '') AS ORGA_DOCUMENTO , MAES.ORGA_DESCRIPCION , DIRC_DIRECCION || ', ' || DIRC_PORTAL || ', ' || DIRC_piso || DIRC_letra || DIRC_puerta as direccion , DIRC_COD_POSTAL , NULL AS UNLOCODE , DIRC_PERSONA_CONTACTO , DIRC_TELEFONOA , DIRC_TELEFONOB , DIRC_FAX , DIRC_EMAIL , DIRC_PAGINA_WEB FROM ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA MAES LEFT JOIN ICOM_DIRECCION_CONT_DIRC ON DIRC_ID_ORGANIZACION = ORGA_ID order by MAES.ORGA_ES_ACTIVO desc

select maes.EMBD_id , maes.EMBD_CODIGO , maes.EMBD_MATRICULA , maes.EMBD_NOMBRE , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.embd_tipo_embarcacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOEMBARCACION_TEMD') as embd_tipo_embarcacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.embd_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as embd_orga , maes.EMBD_ESLORA , maes.EMBD_MANGA , maes.EMBD_CALADO , maes.EMBD_ALTURA , maes.EMBD_DESPLAZAMIENTO , maes.EMBD_TONELAJE , maes.EMBD_POTENCIA , maes.EMBD_ES_A_MOTOR , maes.EMBD_ES_TRANSEUNTE , maes.EMBD_ES_SUJETO_NAV_INT , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.embd_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as embd_pais , maes.EMBD_OBSERVACIONES from IEMD_EMBARCACION_EMBD maes order by maes.EMBD_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT maes.EMBA_id , maes.EMBA_CODIGO , maes.EMBA_MATRICULA , maes.EMBA_NOMBRE , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.emba_tipo_embarcacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_TIPOEMBARCACION_TEMD') as emba_tipo_embarcacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = eacl_orga_id_cliente AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as eacl_orga_cliente , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = eacl_orga_id_cliente_ad AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as eacl_orga_cliente_ad , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = emba_instalaciondepa_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_INSTALACIONDEPA_INDA') as emba_instalaciondepa , maes.EMBA_ESLORA , maes.EMBA_MANGA , maes.EMBA_CALADO , maes.EMBA_ALTURA , maes.EMBA_DESPLAZAMIENTO , maes.EMBA_TONELAJE , maes.EMBA_POTENCIA , maes.EMBA_ES_A_MOTOR , to_char(maes.EMBA_CODIGO_EXENCION) , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = emba_tipo_exencion_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_EXENCIONTIPO_EXET') as emba_tipo_exencion , EACL.EACL_ES_SUJ_PASIVO_SUST , EACL.EACL_ES_TRANSEUNTE , EACL.EACL_ES_NAVEGACION_INT , maes.EMBA_OBSERVACIONES FROM IEMD_EMBARCACIONAUT_EMBA maes JOIN IEMD_EMBARCACIONAUTCLI_EACL EACL ON EACL_EMBARCACIONAUT_ID = EMBA_ID AND ? BETWEEN EACL_FECHA_INICIO AND COALESCE(EACL_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by maes.EMBA_ES_ACTIVO desc, EACL.EACL_ES_ACTIVO desc

SELECT MAES.iesp_id , SUBSTR(MAES.iesp_CODIGO, 1, 1) AS subp_codigo , SUBSTR(MAES.iesp_CODIGO, 2) , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.iesp_alineacion AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_ALINEACION_ALIN') as iesp_alineacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.iesp_orga_id_estibador AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as iesp_orga_estibador , TEMP.IESP_ES_ADICIONADA_EST , (SELECT I18N.iesp_NOMBRE FROM IMAN_INSTESPECIALi18n_IESP I18N WHERE I18N.IESP_ID = MAES.IESP_ID AND I18N.IESP_IDIOMA = ? AND ? BETWEEN IESP_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(IESP_FECHA_FIN, ?) ) AS i18n_nombre FROM IMAN_INSTESPECIAL_IESP MAES JOIN IMAN_INSTESPECIALtemp_IESP TEMP ON TEMP.IESP_ID = MAES.IESP_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.IESP_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.IESP_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.IESP_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.BUPE_id , MAES.BUPE_CODIGO
, TEMP.bupe_nombre , TEMP.BUPE_CALLSIGN , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_bandera AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as bupe_bandera
, TEMP.BUPE_LISTA , TEMP.bupe_matricula , TEMP.BUPE_FOLIO , TEMP.BUPE_CENSO , TEMP.BUPE_GT , TEMP.BUPE_ESLORA , TEMP.BUPE_MANGA , TEMP.BUPE_CALADO_MAXIMO
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_orga_id_consignatario AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as bupe_orga_consignatario , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_orga_id_armador AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as bupe_orga_armador , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_zona_pesca_id AND trid_table_name = 'IPES_ZONAPESCA_ZOPE') as bupe_zona_pesca , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_arte_pesca_id AND trid_table_name = 'IPES_ARTEPESCA_ARPE') as bupe_arte_pesca , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.bupe_tipo_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IPES_BUQUETIPO_BTPE') as bupe_tipo_buque
, TEMP.BUPE_es_generada_tasa FROM IPES_BUQUE_BUPE MAES JOIN IPES_BUQUEtemp_BUPE TEMP ON TEMP.BUPE_ID = MAES.BUPE_ID AND ? BETWEEN TEMP.BUPE_FECHA_CREACION AND COALESCE(TEMP.BUPE_FECHA_FIN, ?) order by MAES.BUPE_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.REDS_id , ( SELECT SUBP_CODIGO FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = REDS_SUBP_ID ) AS subp_codigo , MAES.REDS_CODIGO as CODIGO , MAES.REDS_NOMBRE , MAES.REDS_TIPO_RED , MAES.REDS_SUBTIPO_RED , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = reds_proveedor_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as reds_proveedor , MAES.REDS_NUMERO_POLIZA , MAES.REDS_POTENCIA , MAES.REDS_TARFIFA , MAES.REDS_COSTE_UNITARIO , MAES.REDS_OBSERVACIONES FROM ISUM_RED_REDS MAES order by MAES.REDS_es_activo desc

SELECT MAES.COSU_id , ( SELECT subp_codigo FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = COSU_SUBP_ID ) AS subp_codigo , MAES.COSU_CODIGO as COSU_CODIGO , MAES.COSU_FECHA_INSTALACION , MAES.COSU_FECHA_BAJA , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = cosu_tipo_id AND trid_table_name = 'ISUM_TIPOCONTADOR_TCSU') as cosu_tipo , MAES.COSU_ESTADO , MAES.COSU_ES_PARA_BUQUES , MAES.COSU_FABRICANTE , MAES.COSU_ANYO_FABRICACION , MAES.COSU_POTENCIA_MAXIMA , MAES.COSU_DIGITOS , MAES.COSU_FACTOR_MULTIPLICADOR , MAES.COSU_FECHA_COMPRA , MAES.COSU_FECHA_FIN_GARANTIA , MAES.COSU_FECHA_INSTALACION , MAES.COSU_FECHA_VIDA_ESTIMADA FROM ISUM_CONTADOR_COSU MAES WHERE ? BETWEEN COSU_FECHA_INSTALACION AND COALESCE(COSU_FECHA_BAJA, ?)

SELECT maes.prsu_id , ( SELECT SUBP_CODIGO FROM IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP WHERE SUBP_ID = ( SELECT REDS_SUBP_ID FROM ISUM_RED_REDS WHERE REDS_ID = PRSU_REDS_ID ) ) AS subp_codigo , ( SELECT REDS_CODIGO FROM ISUM_RED_REDS WHERE REDS_ID = PRSU_REDS_ID ) || '-' || maes.prsu_codigo AS CODIGO , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = prsu_reds_id AND trid_table_name = 'ISUM_RED_REDS') as prsu_reds , PRSU_referencia , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = prsu_tsum_id AND trid_table_name = 'ISUM_TIPOSUMINISTRO_TSUM') as prsu_tsum , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = prsu_ivat_id AND trid_table_name = 'IFAC_IVATIPO_IVAT') as prsu_ivat , PRSU_NOMBRE, PRSU_UBICACION, PRSU_CONSUMO_MIN, PRSU_CONSUMO_MIN_PERIDO, PRSU_TUBERIA_ENT_DIAMETRO, PRSU_TUBERIA_SAL_DIAMETRO , PRSU_DISTANCIA_ANTERIOR, PRSU_RUTA_LECTURA, PRSU_FORMA_REC_LECTURA, PRSU_POSICION_RUTA , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ( SELECT CPSU_COSU_ID FROM ISUM_CONTADORPUNTORED_CPSU WHERE CPSU_PRSU_ID = PRSU_ID AND sysdate between CPSU_FECHA_INICIO AND COALESCE(CPSU_FECHA_FINAL, SYSDATE) AND cpsu_es_activo = 1 ) AND trid_table_name = 'ISUM_CONTADOR_COSU') as prsu_cosu , ( CASE WHEN prsu_inst_deport_subp_id IS NULL THEN NULL
ELSE ( SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ( SELECT amad_id FROM IEMD_AMARRE_AMAD WHERE amad_instalaciondep_id = ( SELECT indp_id FROM iemd_instalaciondep_indp WHERE indp_subpuerto_id = prsu_inst_deport_subp_id AND indp_codigo = prsu_inst_deport_codigo ) AND amad_pantalan = prsu_inst_deport_pantalan AND amad_puesto = prsu_inst_depor_puesto ) AND trid_table_name = 'IEMD_AMARRE_AMAD' ) END ) AS prsu_amad , prsu_seccion_cable, prsu_potencia, prsu_sec_repetidores FROM isum_puntored_prsu maes

SELECT MAES.BUET_id , ( SELECT PAIS_ISO FROM IGEN_PAIS_PAIS WHERE PAIS_ID = BUET_PAIS_ID ) || MAES.BUET_CODIGO as codigo , MAES.BUET_DESCRIPCION , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = buet_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as buet_pais FROM IEST_REGISTROBUQUEEEETIPO_BUET maes order by MAES.BUET_es_activo desc

SELECT maes.burt_id , ( SELECT PAIS_ISO FROM IGEN_PAIS_PAIS WHERE PAIS_ID = BURT_PAIS_ID ) || MAES.BURT_CODIGO AS CODIGO , MAES.BURT_DESCRIPCION , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = burt_buet_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_REGISTROBUQUEEEETIPO_BUET') as burt_buet , MAES.BURT_poblacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = burt_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as burt_pais FROM IEST_REGISTROBUQUETIPO_BURT MAES ORDER BY MAES.BURT_ES_ACTIVO DESC

SELECT MAES.BUqu_buque_id , MAES.BUqu_CODIGO_imo , TEMP.BUQU_nombre_buque , TEMP.BUQU_CALLSIGN , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = buqu_bandera_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as buqu_bandera_pais , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.buqu_buqt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_BUQUETIPO_BUQT') as buqu_buqt , TEMP.BUQU_FECHA_ALTA_EDI , TEMP.BUQU_FECHA_VAL_EDI , TEMP.BUQU_ES_PENdIENTE_VAL_EDI , TEMP.BUQU_OBSERVACIONES_DUE , TEMP.BUQU_GT , TEMP.BUQU_UNIDADES_FACTURACION , TEMP.BUQU_TONELADAS_REGISTRADAS , TEMP.BUQU_TONELAJE_MEDIO , TEMP.BUQU_VOLUMEN_SBT , TEMP.BUQU_UNIDAD_MEDIDA_SBT , TEMP.BUQU_CALADO_MINIMO , TEMP.BUQU_CALADO_MAXIMO , TEMP.BUQU_ESLORA , TEMP.BUQU_MANGA , TEMP.BUQU_ALTURA_PUNTAL , TEMP.BUQU_POTENCIA , TEMP.BUQU_ALTURA_ARBOLADURA , TEMP.BUQU_VELOCIDAD_CRUCERO , TEMP.BUQU_VELOCIDAD_MAXIMA , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_HELICES_PROPULSION , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_HELICES_PROA , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_HELICES_POPA , TEMP.BUQU_HELICES , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_SBT , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_PASARELAS , TEMP.BUQU_ES_DOBLE_CASCO , TEMP.BUQU_ES_CERTIFICADO_CAPITANIA , TEMP.BUQU_ES_MOU_PSC_REQUERIDO , TEMP.BUQU_CAPACIDAD_CARGA_MAX , TEMP.BUQU_LONGITUD_CARGA_MAX , TEMP.BUQU_TRIPULACION_MAXIMA , TEMP.BUQU_PASAJE_MAXIMO , TEMP.BUQU_FECHA_CONSTRUCCION , TEMP.BUQU_SOCIEDAD_CLASIFICACION , TEMP.BUQU_ASEGURADORA , TEMP.BUQU_CLUB_P_I , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.buqu_registro_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') as buqu_registro_pais , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.buqu_burt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_REGISTROBUQUETIPO_BURT') as buqu_burt , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.buqu_armador_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') as buqu_armador_orga , TEMP.BUQU_LIBRO_REGISTRO , TEMP.BUQU_DIRECCION_NAVIERA , TEMP.BUQU_NUMERO_CERTIFICADO_GT , TEMP.BUQU_FECHA_SEG_RESP_CIVIL , TEMP.BUQU_ES_NAVEGACION_INTERN , TEMP.BUQU_ES_OPERACIONES_COMER , TEMP.BUQU_ES_MOU_PSC_INSPECCION , TEMP.BUQU_FECHA_MOU_PSC_INSPECCION , TEMP.BUQU_MOU_PSC_PENDIENTE , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = temp.buqu_mou_psc_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') as buqu_mou_psc_unlo , TEMP.BUQU_OBSERVACIONES FROM IESC_BUQUE_BUQU MAES JOIN IESC_BUQUEtemp_BUQU TEMP ON TEMP.BUqu_buque_id = MAES.BUqu_buque_id order by MAES.BUQU_es_activo desc

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.cerb_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS cerb_buque , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.cerb_cert_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_CERTIFICADOTIPO_CERT') AS cerb_cert
, maes.CERB_FECHA_INICIO_VALIDEZ , maes.CERB_FECHA_FIN_VALIDEZ FROM iesc_certificadobuque_cerb maes

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.buco_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS buco_buque , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.buco_conv_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_CONVENIO_CONV') AS buco_conv
, maes.buqu_fecha_inicio_adhesion , maes.buqu_fecha_fin_adhesion FROM iesc_buqueconvenio_buco maes

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.busp_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS busp_buque , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.busp_subp_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP') AS busp_subp
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = busp_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS busp_orga , maes.busp_es_base_en_puerto , maes.busp_es_plan_residuos_liq , maes.busp_es_plan_residuos_sol , maes.busp_observaciones FROM iesc_buquesubpuerto_busp maes

select (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.trbu_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS trbu_buque , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.trbu_traf_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_TRAFICO_TRAF') AS trbu_traf
, maes.trbu_fecha_inicio , maes.trbu_fecha_fin , coalesce(maes.trbu_numero_puertos, 0) FROM iesc_traficobuque_trbu maes

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.stst_sett_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_SERVICIOTIPO_SETT') AS stst_sett , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.stst_traf_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_TRAFICO_TRAF') AS stst_traf
, maes.stst_fecha_inicio_adhesion , maes.stst_fecha_fin_adhesion , maes.stst_valor FROM iesc_serviciotiposervicio_stst maes ORDER BY stst_es_activo DESC

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.orsp_organizacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS orsp_organizacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.orsp_subpuerto_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_SUBPUERTO_SUBP') AS orsp_subpuerto
, coalesce(DIRN.DIRN_direccion, '') || ' ' || coalesce(dirn_portal, '') || ', ' || coalesce(dirn_piso, '') || ' ' || coalesce(dirn_puerta, '') AS DIRN_DIRECCION , DIRN_COD_POSTAL , NULL AS LOCALIDAD , DIRN_PERSONA_CONTACTO , DIRN_telefonoa , DIRN_TELEFONOB , DIRN_FAX , DIRN_EMAIL , NULL AS web FROM ICOM_ORGANIZACIONSUBP_ORSP MAES LEFT JOIN ICOM_DIRECCION_NOTI_DIRN dirn ON DIRN_SUBP_ID = ORSP_SUBPuerto_ID and DIRN_orga_ID = orsp_organizacion_ID

SELECT (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.orot_organizacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS orot_organizacion , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = maes.orot_tipo_organizacion_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACIONTIPO_ORGT') AS orot_tipo_organizacion FROM icom_organizacionorgt_orot maes
